hibernate-mapping.query: select a from UXAction a where a.Application.Id = :applicationId
select a from UXAction a where a.Application.Id = :applicationId and a.ServiceMethod is null and a.Dialog is null
select a from UXAction a where a.Workflow.Id = :workflowId
select a from UXAction a where a.Dialog.Id = :dialogId
select a from UXAction a where a.CustomDialog.Id = :customDialogId
select a from UXAction a where a.ServiceMethod.Id = :serviceMethodId

select a from UXAction as a where exists ( select va.Action.Id, count(*) from ViewAction as va where va.ViewNode.Dialog.Id = :dialogId and va.Action.Id = a.Id group by va.Action.Id having count(*) > 1 )
